snippet: Zambia's ruling party has settled on Defence Minister Edgar Lungu as its presidential candidate, it emerged on Saturday, ending months of in-fighting that had threatened its chances at a Jan. 20 election....

headline.print_headline: Zambia's Ruling Party Mends Rift to Make Lungu Its Presidential Candidate
headline.main: Zambia's Ruling Party Mends Rift to Make Lungu Its Presidential Candidate

lead_paragraph: Zambia's ruling party has settled on Defence Minister Edgar Lungu as its presidential candidate, it emerged on Saturday, ending months of in-fighting that had threatened its chances at a Jan. 20 election.
